user_stories.title: Create a health check endpoint
user_stories.description: Add a GET /health endpoint that returns { "status": "ok" } with a 200 status code. Use axum as the HTTP framework.
acceptance_criteria: The server starts on port 3000 by default
A unit test verifies the health endpoint response

user_stories.title: Add a greeting endpoint with query params
user_stories.description: Add a GET /greet?name=<name> endpoint that returns { "message": "Hello, <name>!" }. If no name is provided, default to "World".
acceptance_criteria: A unit test covers both cases

technical_requirements: Use Rust with axum and tokio
All tests must pass with cargo test
